title: Structural Coding Analysis-Based Instructional Design for Renewable Energy Technology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Education utilizing mobile-based microlearning modules and project collaboration tools in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model and analyze data on renewable energy technology principles (solar, wind, etc.)
Educators can identify content knowledge gaps in instructional design using structural coding analysis
Instructors can design project-based assessment-aligned renewable energy education modules for middle school students
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
